title: Windows 11 and Bookmarks
content: Can't move stuff to "Bookmarks" in Windows 11, will not paste. Works fine on Windows 10 machine. Any help would be appreciated.
creator: aarross

title: about.config
content:
EASE OF USE

Why are common formatting commands not easily accessible from pull-down menus?

You say "Kindness is at the heart of our community." but this is not true of the way you treat users.
creator: mlevin

title: Can't login Vanguard
content: I can't login to Vanguard.com. When I enter my ID & password then click on the Login icon, the icon blinks as usual but nothing happens. I'm not sure when the problem started as it's been a little while since I logged in. I think it worked in V92. Fails in both V93 & 94. I went through the cookie, history & cache delete procedure but no change.
creator: rw330i

title: changing the look of FF home page
content:
This morning I turned on PC where FF is set as home page. There was a large pop up in middle of screen with some sort of new color change options for home page. I liked what I saw and was testing some designs, but I cannot get it back. I had hit the "use previous selection", I believe what it said, and it went back to my original screen. I thought it would go to the one I had chosen, a deep green background. At any rate, how can I get this option back to try again...?

Thanks

LT in Winnipeg
creator: unclepine

title: update
content:
Illegible shrinking text. Why is my "unique" text so faint, that it is hard to read, but the border of the box, the question "How can we help?" is dark black, so very legible.

The not so subtle message is: we hate our users and their ideas, we want them to squint and struggle to use our programs, not we want yo to see the headings clearly, we warn you about up-dates and give you choices. Empty explanations, like a modern, up-to-date format, are just that empty. Nerds ≠ users. Both have value. WTF!!
creator: mlevin

title: Change of default search engine not possible
content:
I am experiencing the same problem as multiple other Firefox users. Here are examples:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1346958

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1203608

I too set the default search engine to Google, but it keeps reverting to Bing. Living in a free society, I would like to retain my right of choice to search using the search engine I want to use, not have this choice made for me.

I attach two screenshots marked with a red square showing that all I see when trying to change the default search engine is the Firefox logo and the words "a browser". No other search engines are available, neither Bing, nor Google nor any other.

I have tried the solutions suggested, but they are not appropriate in my case.

If this is due to a bug, or a wilful decision to the advantage of Microsoft, I urge you to squash the bug causing this or end the commercial arrangement with Microsoft.
creator: ian.thresher

title: I can't see the borders of my tabs
content: This morning Firefox said it was redesigned, and now I can't see the borders of my tabs. I want to go back to where I can see the borders of my tabs rather than having the tab labels just free-floating, which is confusing to me. How do I revert?
creator: jeffshelby1

title: Disable Alt key to show title/menu bar
content:
Goodday!

I am in need to disable the title/menu bar pop up whenever I press alt, as this conflicts with a browser application I am using, breaking it more times than not. Is there a way to disable specific short-cuts?

I have tried disabling permissions.default.shortcuts, but this disables all short-cuts besides the alt key.
creator: rik.wijngaards

title: £bangladesH2020
content: They will always say their own apps are good But since you have added it to the add-ons, you are responsible for its good and bad
creator: ceo01303087481

title: Aktualizace
content:
Dobrý den,

nová aktualizace se mi vůbec nelíbí, chtěl bych původní vzhled, prosím jak to mám udělat? Děkuji.


Michal Valšík valsik@lstork.cz
creator: valsik

title: Show number of selected items in download tab
content:
Is there a way to display the number of selected items when in the download tab, just like in the history and bookmark tab?

Thanks for an answer
creator: suus2nance

title: Virustotal segnala positività
content: Un antivirus di virustotal segnala una positività.
creator: webmaster93

title: cercando di aprire ILIAD,mi dice: La pagina non reindirizza in modo corretto
content: La pagina non reindirizza in modo corretto. cercando di aprire ILIAD, dopo un po' di attesa, compare: La pagina non reindirizza in modo corretto
creator: biagiosantaiti

title: Firefox color - dark theme
content:
I'm trying to customize colors of Firefox developer edition. I would like to have a dark toolbar bit i don't wont to enable dark mode for any website.

I have installed Firefox color and whenever i choose a darker color for the toolbar all websites are displaying their dark versions (it behaves like the dark mode is turned on).

I have tried to manual set browser.theme.content-theme and browser.theme.toolbar-theme but after every restart these get overridden.

Does anyone know how to make this happen?

The funny thing is that everything was fine before today's update...i tried reinstalling Firefox and also i tried disabling all extensions...
creator: dario.jakovljevic1

title: Google Images reverse search via drag and drop does not work
content:
Hi. I use Google reverse image search pretty often. When I have to apply search to image saved to my local storage, I go to images.google.com, drag image file from my Windows 10 desktop and drop it onto the Google search field. Unfortunately, it stopped working reliably few months ago. Sometimes it works, but most of times not.

I'm sure it is a Firefox bug since I tried to disable all of my extensions, delete cookies and even made clean Firefox installation in Windows Sandbox. Results were always the same. In Microsoft Edge, everything works fine.

Could somebody fix that please? After YouTube's inability to remember my theme selection (I was used to bright theme, but I had to stick with default dark one), this is another annoying issue I have on Google sites.

Thanks.
creator: andrewz1986

title: Firefox just updated and disappeared my saved Home pages. Can I recover them?
content: Firefox just updated and disappeared my saved Home pages. Can I recover them?
creator: GarySGP

title: Cannot signin to PayPal
content:
Hi, I love Firefox and have been using it. But since today I cannot even log in to paypal.com. Gives a security verification error. New window doesn't help either. What gives? I have to switch to Chrome now? IE11 no problem. Lucky for me, because I had to transfer funds from paypal to my bank.

Like everyone else (almost), heavily overdoing everything. To the point of the extreme actually.

Not a good feature! best regards, John
creator: villario

title: this week, while playing POGO on firefox, it started flickering and then vanishing. Also started to lose the page while checking my email
content: while playing Pogo on Firefox this week , the page started to flicker sometimes. now it just crashes and disappears at random, usually a few minutes of playing. then today it also did this to my gmail while checking emails. This doesn't happen in another browser (Edge, Chrome) only Firefox, my preferred browser. I've cleared the cache, rebooted, checked for updates etc. This happens on desktop and 2 laptops so far. Thank you.
creator: dldurbin50

title: how do I get rid of new version colors and return to old boring and less distracting version?
content: I do not at all like the purple you have added to my search in you r"colors" innovation. How do I turn it off and go back to old format?
creator: wktabb

title: site fonts
content:
Hello! I have a big problem with fonts used on sites. As you can see in attached photo. The problem persists even after I reinstall the browser.

The problem does not exists in other browsers.

What can I do? I like Firefox very much, but because of this issue I am forced to use another browser.

Waiting for your solution! Thanks!
creator: mariustabarcea5

title: Since  Firefox 94.0 website UK natch  won't load
content:
Firefox updated yesterday to 94.0 since then I can't access website UKmatch.com the page tries to load but won't

I've scanned for malware and viruses, all clear,disabled firewall and all addons still won't work

I tried it on Firefox 93 and it works OK let Firefox update to 94.0 won't work, the site works on Microsoft Edge

I've been with Firefox since day 1 and have never had a problem like this

Has anyone got any ideas please?
creator: paulandrewjones

title: Color override in setting not working
content: In Firefox version 94.0 color overrides in settings not working. I have text set ti white, background to black, "Override the colors specified by the page with your selections above" to always, Use system colors to false and im getting black text on white background on all websites.
creator: aivars-ik

title: Can I move "pinned tabs" under URL bar? (or anywhere else)
content:
Pretty much what the subject says - I would like to be able to move the pinned tabs somewhere else, to keep them seperate away from the normal opened tabs :-)

Is it possible somehow?
creator: YesFish

title: Disable (youtube) play button on tabbar
content: I was wondering if there is a "simple" way to disable this feature, since i really don't like starting videos without actually being in the tab. And i generally don't like control buttons in tiny tabs with 1/3 play button, 1/3 title, 1/3 close button. Is there a way to disable at least the play button?
creator: rastrack

title: notifiche instagram
content: Buongiorno ho un problema con le notifiche instagram in quanto le ricevo e mi appaiono in basso a destro sullo schermo ma cliccandoci sopra la finestra del browser non si apre... grazie
creator: davideisidoro

title: Primary password help - password never set, but I need to enter it?
content:
Laptop had issues booting (icky Dell and Windows 11).

When I rebooted and opened Firefox, I was prompted with a Password Required dialog box and a request to "Please enter your Primary Password."

I've never set a primary password, or a master password when that term was used.

I've seen I can reset my primary password, but I lose my saved logins. I know that's not too hard to re set up....

But why am I being asked to enter a password I've never set?

Firefox for Windows Version 93.0 (64-bit)
creator: rob.elli

title: Bookshelf icon gone, only "Other Bookmarks" folder shows
content: Hi, since the last update my bookshelf icon is gone and I can't show my list of bookmarks on the side of the screen. To see and search my bookmarks, I now have to click on "Manage bookmarks" which is pretty annoying as it is very cumbersome to find what I need. I would love to be able to see all my bookmarks at one glance again. Where has that icon/list gone? There also used to be an option "Show all bookmarks" which is gone too. Please help me as I am heavily dependent on my bookmarks for my work. Thank you.
creator: heike.fetting

title: Upgrade to FF94 has made the homepage shortcuts too small.
content:
Upgrade to FF94 has horribly messed up my much loved FF homepage.

The pinned shortcuts are now too small and too far apart. Their images - those that weren't lost in the upgrade - have been shrunk to half their previous size. Why? How is this an improvement?

This problem had arisen in an earlier release but the fix I had found for it (https://www.reddit.com/r/firefox/comments/nrln39/homepage_pinned_sites_too_small_and_widely_spread/) isn't working any more.

Please can you suggest how I may restore my much missed homepage?

Thanks in anticipation, Peter
creator: peter500

title: Duplicate tab does not make the new tab active
content: I have just updated to 91.3.0esr (32-bit). When I Duplicate tab there is a new tab opened, but it is not set as active tab. This have changed from previous esr version, where the new tab were set as active tab.
creator: sven_y_joensson

title: Home page shortcut icons
content:
Hello Firefox, recently I put an antivirus on my PC on the 22.10.2021, and lost the Firefox browser home page which contained shortcut thumbnails icons. This morning the original firefox home page appeared on my desktop with all of my shortcut thumbnail icons.

Unfortunately the old page vanished again when I closed and reopened webpages on the PC, what can I do to reclaim all of the old thumbnail shortcuts

Mike
creator: e80nythecat

title: add-ons
content: I have had Metamask installed for a long time but recently it has vanished from my browser and despite enabling it many times, deleting and reinstalling and turning it on, it still is not showing up in Firefox. I tried connecting Uniswap to it and it sends me to the download metamask page even though I have already downloaded and installed. What is going on?
creator: nicobowen

title: Switching off searching in the address bar
content: I see that others have also asked this question. I've done the about:config, keyw and changed it to false but when I try and search in google (in the middle of the page) it still defers to the address bar. Why does firefox do this and why does it have to be such a drama to change it? A simple answer please, I don't want to do anything more than have my preference to search in the google box in the middle of the page. Thanks
creator: startmeup1150

title: version 94
content: Automatically upgraded to version 94 on 11/2/2021. OS is Windows 10. Now Dark mode no longer functions even when enabled in extensions and themes. Any solution available?

title: Opening home page has been replaced.
content: My opening home page has been my Outlook Mail page. It has now been replaced by a Firefox opening page with a pinkish background hue that shows icons for a bunch of different web sites - including one for Outlook Mail (which will open Outlook Mail, but I don't want the inconvenience of having to access it this way), plus it also shows a bunch of Pocket web sites as well. I would like to restore Outlook Mail as my previous opening home page. Thank you for your help.

title: Microsoft punishes Firefox users by placing account into Pause with green screen
content:
Over a year of not being able to use our home computer in Seattle using Firefox. Microsoft punishes us for using Firefox in Seattle by placing any request or search on Firefox into a full Green Screen labeled PAUSE.

From there left with option to turn computer off. COMCAST Staff say this in not their fault. They receive about $80 month for internet service. My wife and I feel like we are criminals locked up in a high security prison in downtown Seattle, with no way to get out. HELP! HELP! SOS HELP!

EDWARDSEAFELDT@HOTMAIL.COM HP Windows Laptop Core i7
creator: edwardseafeldt

title: new update just dropped, now custom colors dont work on most webpages or in settings

title: What Happened To Firefox Feedback?
content: I tried to hit the Feedback under Firefox Help because this latest update has completely broken the ability to report comments or inappropriate posts on Facebook, to the group admins, but all I keep seeing is something called Mozila.Crowdcity.com! I didn't have any trouble submitting feedback prior to this.

title: Firefox connecting at 30% speed available (from ISP)
content:
Hello support

I'm having a bit of difficulty with download speeds in Firefox - I'm on a 1000Mbps connection, but Firefox 78.15.0esr can only download at 300-350Mpbs.

Chrome downloads at 700Mbps and Opera at 900Mbps.

Tested with fast.com and speedtest.net, multiple times/various servers, and Firefox speeds are consistently limited to 350Mbps.

Is there anything I can do to speed up Firefox downloads?

Thank you.

title: New York Times live pages won't load
content: Maybe sometime in the past week or so, I began noticing an issue on the New York Times website. I am able to load most articles there normally, but some, marked with a 'live' button for certain types of rapidly updated topics (e.g. election day vote updates or the like) won't load. https://www.nytimes.com/live/2021/11/02/us/election-news?action=click&pgtype=Article&state=default&module=styln-elections-2020®ion=TOP_BANNER&context=election_recirc This is an example of such a page. I click them and just get white space. I normally use a private browser tab for all webpages but it still doesn't load if I use the normal page rather than an in-private window. I would appreciate any help. Let me know if there is any other information I can provide to help people help me. I may need to be walked through some suggestions. I am using version 94 on Linux Mint as of today, and up until today was using whatever the immediately previous version available for Mint was. The described behavior happened on both versions, if that is relevant.
creator: owendombert
